author: Lindsay Farber
title: Kylie Jenner Shared What It's Like To Get Measured For A Wax Figure And TBH, It's Kind Of Crazy
text:
View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10455780 2. And by the looks of it, the entire process seems pre y freaking crazy. “You guys, we’re here doing the first measurements,” she said. “I’m getting my very own wax figure! It takes like six months.” Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @kylizzlesnapchats ID: 10455609 3. First, Kylie posed for photos in a number of positions while wearing spandex, giving creators options when making her clone: Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @kylizzlesnapchats ID: 10455611 4. After that, they matched her skin tone, making sure to get the ~perfect shade~: View this image ›
Kylie Jenner / Snapchat ID: 10455610 5. They measured her face and got molds of her hands: Kylie Jenner / Snapchat
Kylie Jenner / Snapchat
 ID: 10455864 6. THEY EVEN MATCHED HER EYEBALLS: View this image ›
Kylie Jenner / Snapchat So weird.
ID: 10455612 7. And while Kylie’s twin won’t be complete for quite some time, one big question still remains… View this image ›
Kylie Jenner / Snapchat ID: 10455618 8. WHICH LIP KIT COLOR WILL HER WAX FIGURE WEAR??? View this image ›
